StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_UpdateRFATrackingDates]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ContractID int, @SentToDistDate date.me, @DistReceivedDate date.me, @MCRCReceivedDate date.me, @MailedToMCRCDate date.me, @MCRCOAMailedDate date.me, @MCRCMailsToOSS date.me, @UserLogin varchar(15) AS
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM RFA_TRACKING_DATES WHERE CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID) BEGIN UPDATE RFA_TRACKING_DATES SET SENT_TO_DIST_DATE = @SentToDistDate, DIST_RECEIVED_DATE = @DistReceivedDate, MAILED_TO_MCRC_DATE = @MailedToMCRCDate, MCRC_RECEIVED_DATE = @MCRCReceivedDate, MCRC_OA_MAILED_DATE = @MCRCOAMailedDate, MCRC_MAILS_TO_OSS = @MCRCMailsToOSS, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO RFA_TRACKING_DATES (CONTRACT_ID, SENT_TO_DIST_DATE, DIST_RECEIVED_DATE, MAILED_TO_MCRC_DATE, MCRC_RECEIVED_DATE, MCRC_OA_MAILED_DATE, MCRC_MAILS_TO_OSS, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (@ContractID, @SentToDistDate, @DistReceivedDate, @MailedToMCRCDate, @MCRCReceivedDate, @MCRCOAMailedDate, @MCRCMailsToOSS, @UserLogin, GETDATE()) END
